One way to test this is to modify bitcoin-chainstate a bit:

```diff
diff --git a/src/bitcoin-chainstate.cpp b/src/bitcoin-chainstate.cpp
index 7312ae45d4..4ec71ca3fb 100644
--- a/src/bitcoin-chainstate.cpp
+++ b/src/bitcoin-chainstate.cpp
@@ -53,6 +53,10 @@ int main(int argc, char* argv[])
     // SETUP: Misc Globals
     SelectParams(CBaseChainParams::MAIN);
     const CChainParams& chainparams = Params();
+LogInstance().m_print_to_console=true;
+LogInstance().m_file_path = AbsPathForConfigVal("log_debug");
+LogInstance().m_log_timestamps = false;
+Assert(LogInstance().StartLogging());

```

Command to test:

```
make && ./src/bitcoin-chainstate /tmp/temp_dd
```
